error.message: Call to deprecated function ip2country_get_country(). Deprecated in ip2country:8.x-1.9 and is removed from ip2country:8.x-2.0. Use the ip2country.lookup service instead. For example, \Drupal::service('ip2country.lookup')->getCountry($ip_address).
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to block_country.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
